Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CA2026 4-core processor simulator

Project Setup:
- 4-core pipelined processor simulator with MESI cache coherency
- Visual Studio 2022 project configuration
- VS Code build/debug configuration

Implemented Components:
- Data structures \(sim.h\): Simulator, Core, Pipeline, Cache, MainMemory, BusArbiter
- Instruction decoder \(instruction.c\): decode/encode, opcode handling, helper functions
- Initialization \(init.c\): init_simulator, init_core, init_cache, init_main_memory, init_bus_arbiter
- File I/O \(stubs.c\): All 9 load/save functions for imem, memin, memout, regout, trace, bustrace, dsram, tsram, stats

Critical Fixes:
- Stack overflow fix: Allocate Simulator on heap \(8MB+ structure\)
- Security fixes: sprintf -> sprintf_s with bounds checking
- Compiler warnings: _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS for standard C functions
- Array bounds: Explicit array sizing with NUM_FILES constant

Testing:
- Successfully loads example instruction and memory files
- Generates all 27 output files with correct formats
- Verified hex formatting and file structure

Next Steps:
- Implement register file \(R0=0, R1=1, R2-R15 general purpose\)
- Implement 5-stage pipeline \(Fetch, Decode, Execute, Mem, WriteBack\)
- Implement cache and MESI protocol
- Implement bus arbiter with round-robin arbitration
